meanings.definition: A representation of a cross with a figure of Jesus Christ on it.
meanings.sent1: The church displayed beautiful crucifixes on its walls.
meanings.sent2: She wore a necklace with tiny crucifixes as a symbol of her faith.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide the crucifixes in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The crucifixes in the old chapel seemed to watch over the visitors.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted intricate crucifixes with great attention to detail.
